snippet.title: Raid on Bungeling Bay - C64 Longplay/walkthrough
snippet.description:
A Commodore 64 game from the creator of SimCity and The Sims, Will Wright and published by Brøderbund in 1984. 
Will Wright continued to improve the editor of this game to lately create SimCity.

In this game you take control of a helicopter with the mission of destroy six enemy factories scattered accross several islands. The more factory you destroy the harder the game become, you can repair the helicopter and refill of bombs on your carrier, you can also refills bombs on enemy airports.
If you lose too much time the enemy will build a battleship that fires guided missiles, you got to deal with or it will destroy your carrier.
